channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Speculative trading is booming again. That could turn into a headwind for the S&P 500, says Goldman Sachs.
item.description: Investors have been piling into highly risky shares.

item.title: Is this the Nvidia of nuclear power? The stock has soared almost 400% in the past year.
item.description: NuScale Power has the government support, the technology and the financial backing to succeed. Will that be enough?

item.title: ‘The selling agent is long dead’: My $250,000 term life-insurance policy costs $2,000 a month. I’m 80. Is it time to ditch it?
item.description: “I took out a $250,000 policy for a 10-year term. At the time, the payments were $200 per month.”

item.title: Intel earnings bring more questions than answers, sending the stock lower

item.title: How much will your next hospital stay cost? No one seems to know — new rules may help.
item.description: How much will your next hospital stay cost? The answer is still unclear — but new rules may help.

item.title: Freed says 20,000 clinicians are using its medical AI transcription ‘scribe,’ but competition is rising fast
item.description: Rather than chase enterprise contracts with large hospital systems, Freed has focused on small clinics and solo practitioners.

item.title: Bonsai Robotics and farm-ng unite for intelligent farming solutions

item.title: Anthropic unveils ‘auditing agents’ to test for AI misalignment
item.description: Anthropic developed its auditing agents while testing Claude Opus 4 for alignment issues.

item.title: Richtech Robotics’ ADAM serves drinks at Kennedy Space Center

item.title: White House plan signals “open-weight first” era—and enterprises need new guardrails
item.description: Enterprises will not see immediate impact from the AI Action Plan, but it signals wider support for open-source models and evaluations.

item.title: Experts support Massachusetts bill to ban weaponized robots

item.title: SecurityPal combines AI and experts in Nepal to speed enterprise security questionnaires by 87X or more
item.description: The Kathmandu center of excellence gives SecurityPal a cost base low enough to keep humans in the loop while staying price-competitive.

item.title: Qwen3-Coder-480B-A35B-Instruct launches and it ‘might be the best coding model yet’
item.description: Developers can define custom tools and let Qwen3-Coder dynamically invoke them during conversation or code generation tasks.
